title: Boutique Heritage Escape in the Heart of Spanish Basque Country with Daily Breakfast
description: Retreat to a stunningly restored charming 17th-century palace ensconced amid mountains and woodlands in Spain's picturesque Basque Country. Discover the elegance of this historic property, boasting an alluring blend of traditional decor, vintage furniture, ornate fireplaces and expansive, manicured gardens. Feel right at home in the well-appointed rooms and feast on authentic Basque delicacies at the hotel's acclaimed Baliara restaurant, helmed by Mexican chef Enrique Fleischmann. Should you wish to venture out, rent a car and trace your way along the dramatic clifftop roads, stumble across medieval towns and visit the foodie town of San Sebastián.
offer_address: Eliz Bailara 8, 20496, Bidania-Goiatz, Gipuzkoa, Pais Vasco, Spain

title: Heritage Spain Country Elegance in the Heart of Basque
description:
Discover pure elegance at the restored 17th-century Iriarte Jauregia Hotel, a gorgeous country estate nestled between mountains in the heart of Spain’s culture-rich Basque Country. An alluring mix of traditional décor, antique furniture, crackling fireplaces and immaculate, expansive gardens creates a warm and cosy atmosphere you’ll never want to leave. Dine at the hotel’s Bailara restaurant for a trip to foodie heaven: think mouthwatering, traditional Basque cuisine meets creative avant-garde innovation.

Set along Spain’s northern Atlantic coast, the magical Basque Country is where fairytale villages, ultra-modern architectural sites and a world-renowned gastronomy scene come together. Rent a car and follow the dramatic clifftop roads past stunning coastal scenery to highlights like the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and tempranillo wine regions, with countless medieval towns along the way.
